divs: sighting detailson august 14 sun evening around 6:00pm i noticed a larger reflective object in a stationary position in the north \north\east sky. there were clouds of the very thin type and the object was just passing over them as they passed by the object. i went in to grab a kodak easy pic camera but was unable to locate the object with the camera, but |i could still see it visually. at this point i went back in the house to get my mothers 10x binoculars. it was a large translucent object that was starting a flight path from north\east to the south\west. the object was starting to gain a lot of altitude. i went back in to ask my dad to come have a look and when he found the object with the 10x binoculars he said it looked like a clover. i was surprised at his comment so when i looked again with the 10x binoculars it was three glowing round object \ like a clover formation behind \ beside the original object which reflected light in the beginning but was translucent through the 10x binoculars. this object was starting to gain a lot of altitude so my dad went back in the house and grabbed a 25x power binocular and the object was hard to locate but when i did find it it was really high way up there, still had the clover object with it. when i handed my dad the 25x power binocular to see he could not locate the object and when i turned my attention back to the sky it was no longer there. i was sure it had climbed to such a height we could no longer see it. it was 6:30pm at when we gave up. but there is a lot of air traffic here from the atl heartsfield air port as well as dobbins afb which is close. i did not see any f22 ect check out the object but it was really high, higher then the cloud cover to begin with then it ascended to a extreme height. the object was not a plane or helicopter. and guessing from the height and the viewable size it had to have been really large, even my dad comment whatever it is it is big. way bigger then any weather balloon or birthday balloon. surely this was observed by other people through out this area. the height can be figured by the cloud cover this day as the object was just over the passing clouds when first seeing it.
Summary: A reflective object but when looking through binoculars it appeared translucent then later at a higher altitude it had three glowing / gold objects forming like a clover beside / beneth it.
trends: There have been 21 other sightings in Marietta
There were no other sightings in Marietta on or around August 14th 2011
